resources.string: Complete the Go Bank and Diamond Store jobs.$NL;This assignment requires you to play from the lobby to the end of the heist.
The host has left the game
(Your removed modifications will be placed in the inventory)
Do you really want to buy $item;?$NL;$NL;It will cost you $money;.$NL;$NL;$num_in_inventory;
You are about to add modification $mod; to your weapon.

Great work. Left those Murkywater goons scratching their asses and wondering where their shit went. Gage is happy, and Murkywater isn't. This means you're starting to get notorious. And, at the end of the day, notoriety is your life-blood. Money can be stolen, see. Gold can come and go. But notoriety - that's what you're really worth. So let's get some more.
Are you sure you want to quit?

Are you sure you would like to terminate the current contract?$NL;$NL;You and your crew will be returned to the planning phase where a new contract can be selected.
If you sell this, you will be paid $money;.
This will replace your current modification $mod;.
These modifications are not compatible and will be removed:$mods;
You are about to remove modification $mod; from your weapon.
